external_references.source_name: Google Threat Intelligence Group MUSTANG PANDA PLUGX August 2025
external_references.description: Patrick Whitsell. (2025, August 25). Deception in Depth: PRC-Nexus Espionage Campaign Hijacks Web Traffic to Target Diplomats. Retrieved September 9, 2025.

objects.description: [CANONSTAGER](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1237) uses the Thread Local Storage (TLS) array data structure to store function addresses resolved by its custom API hashing algorithm. The function addresses are later called throughout the binary from offsets into the TLS array.(Citation: Google Threat Intelligence Group MUSTANG PANDA PLUGX August 2025)
